item.title: Article Submission Guide
item.description: In this document, you will find information about submitting articles. Accepted Article Categories Articles must be related to Internet Governance, Technology Law, or relevant Public Polices. Submission Process Contact Us: Please contact us via email and include relevant information such as the article’s subject, draft, and author details. Submit in Markdown Format: Our blog uses Hugo, so please submit your article in Markdown format. For those new to Markdown, we recommend using online Markdown editors such as StackEdit or HackMD.
